# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.SSE42 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SSE4.2 instructions. A value of true indicates that the processor supports SSE4.2.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: SSE42
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey SSE42 { get; }
```
